'''"Droopy likes ricochet"''' is an album-exclusive song composed by [[C418]] that only appears on ''[[Minecraft - Volume Alpha]]''.

== Track description ==
"Droopy likes ricochet" is composed of a muffled, reverbed synth drums that begins playing a mid-tempo beat before fading into a fuller sound, beginning a calm, cruising synth piece with an echoing "meow" sound and chopped up samples of a robotic voice.

"Droopy likes ricochet" continues into "[[Droopy likes your face]]".

== Trivia ==
* “Droopy likes ricochet” is also from C418's previous album, [https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/life-changing-moments-seem-minor-in-pictures ''life changing moments seem minor in pictures''].
* Although never included in the game, "Droopy likes ricochet" was used [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m_yqOoUMHPg in a video] by Vareide that was featured on [[minecraft.net]].
* A remixed mash-up of "Droopy likes ricochet" and "Droopy likes your face" by C418 was released as "Droopy Remembers" for the album [https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/148 ''148''].
